bug.author: vfdev-5
bug.summary: Fix mypy issue with pytorch nightly
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸ› Bug description</denchmark-h>
Currently, there is an issue with running mypy on ignite when using pytorch-nightly : <denchmark-code> ignite/distributed/comp_models/native.py:334: error: Incompatible types in assignment (expression has type "ReduceOp", variable has type "str") [assignment] op = self._reduce_op_map[op] ^ Found 1 error in 1 file (checked 84 source files) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/runs/1373059337#step:5:17>https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/runs/1373059337#step:5:17</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gruebel>@gruebel</denchmark-link> could you please take a look if we can fix it ? Thanks

comments.comment: Sure, I can take a look today
yeah, good point. Already forgot about it ğŸ™ˆ
